audio_file: Relay the message Lianne Ashley Mata Jurex Losa 648310822503 010625.wav

transcription.text: Hello? Hello? Hello?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Hello po. Hello po. Good afternoon po. Corex Loza po. Speaking na po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ay wala po siya. Wala po siya. Asahan niyo po ito.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ay, good afternoon po sa inyo, ma'am. By the way, ma'am, this is Ian Mata po from CreditMax.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ay ma'am, regarding...
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: And I'm calling on behalf of Maya Bank po. Designers recorded po, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Di po kasi, ma'am. Ma'am, di po kasi na-open yung... Ano niya, simula na nagkaroon ng case recommendation, laging failed yung registration. Nag-message na po ako dun sa securemaya.ph po. Wala pa po siyang reply kasi yun po yung sinabi dun sa Maya kung ano yung gagawin.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Good afternoon po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Nagpasta po ako ng mga requirements.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Matulungan namin regarding sa Maya.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Mamaya pa po yun, ma'am, na gabi.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Gabi pa. Pero hindi naman po siya nagbago ng number, ma'am, no?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Apo.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Same pa rin naman yung ginagamit.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi naman po. Wala po kasi, ma'am, dito. Wala, wala po kasi naman dito yung signal lang dito simula nung ano.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sa signal lang po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Nung nagpag- Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sige po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Oh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Kung sakali man, ma'am, ha? Pasabihan na lang din si Sir para ma-assist namin siya regarding sa Maya Bank. Siguro later na lang din po after office hours ni Sir. Try po namin kayong kontakin, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Or si Sir po. Makausap lang po namin siya sa line po. Maraming salamat ulit sa inyo, ma'am. And good afternoon po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Thank you.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Have a great day po, ma'am. Bye-bye po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Thank you po.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Thank you, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Hello? Hello? Hello?
translation.english: Hello? Hello? Hello?

translation.tagalog: Hello po. Hello po. Good afternoon po. Corex Loza po. Speaking na po.
translation.english: Hello. Hello. Good afternoon. This is Corex Loza. Speaking.

translation.tagalog: Ay wala po siya. Wala po siya. Asahan niyo po ito.
translation.english: Oh, he's not here. He's not here. Please expect this.

translation.tagalog: Ay, good afternoon po sa inyo, ma'am. By the way, ma'am, this is Ian Mata po from CreditMax.
translation.english: Ah, good afternoon to you, ma'am. By the way, ma'am, this is Ian Mata from CreditMax.

translation.tagalog: Ay ma'am, regarding...
translation.english: Ah ma'am, regarding...

translation.tagalog: And I'm calling on behalf of Maya Bank po. Designers recorded po, ma'am.
translation.english: And I'm calling on behalf of Maya Bank. This call is recorded, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Di po kasi, ma'am. Ma'am, di po kasi na-open yung... Ano niya, simula na nagkaroon ng case recommendation, laging failed yung registration. Nag-message na po ako dun sa securemaya.ph po. Wala pa po siyang reply kasi yun po yung sinabi dun sa Maya kung ano yung gagawin.
translation.english: Because ma'am, the app hasn’t opened… Ever since the case recommendation, the registration keeps failing. I already messaged securemaya.ph. There’s no reply yet, because that’s what Maya said to do.

translation.tagalog: Good afternoon po.
translation.english: Good afternoon.

translation.tagalog: Nagpasta po ako ng mga requirements.
translation.english: I already submitted the requirements.

translation.tagalog: Matulungan namin regarding sa Maya.
translation.english: So we can help regarding Maya.

translation.tagalog: Mamaya pa po yun, ma'am, na gabi.
translation.english: That will be later tonight, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Gabi pa. Pero hindi naman po siya nagbago ng number, ma'am, no?
translation.english: Tonight. But he hasn’t changed his number, ma'am, right?

translation.tagalog: Apo.
translation.english: Yes.

translation.tagalog: Same pa rin naman yung ginagamit.
translation.english: He’s still using the same number.

translation.tagalog: Hindi naman po. Wala po kasi, ma'am, dito. Wala, wala po kasi naman dito yung signal lang dito simula nung ano.
translation.english: No, ma'am. It’s just that there’s no signal here ever since that time.

translation.tagalog: Sa signal lang po.
translation.english: Just a signal issue.

translation.tagalog: Nung nagpag- Thank you.
translation.english: Since then— Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Sige po.
translation.english: Alright.

translation.tagalog: Oh.
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: Kung sakali man, ma'am, ha? Pasabihan na lang din si Sir para ma-assist namin siya regarding sa Maya Bank. Siguro later na lang din po after office hours ni Sir. Try po namin kayong kontakin, ma'am.
translation.english: If possible, ma'am, please also inform Sir so we can assist him regarding Maya Bank. Maybe later after Sir’s office hours, we’ll try to contact you, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Okay.
translation.english: Okay.

translation.tagalog: Or si Sir po. Makausap lang po namin siya sa line po. Maraming salamat ulit sa inyo, ma'am. And good afternoon po.
translation.english: Or Sir. We just want to talk to him on the line. Thank you again, ma'am. And good afternoon.

translation.tagalog: Thank you.
translation.english: Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Have a great day po, ma'am. Bye-bye po.
translation.english: Have a great day, ma'am. Bye-bye.

translation.tagalog: Thank you po.
translation.english: Thank you.

translation.tagalog: Thank you, ma'am.
translation.english: Thank you, ma'am.
